name: Detective Ragger
description:
A detective game about a young detective who longs to find his missing father. In this demo project, you play as his father before he goes missing and see what led up to the situation.

This project was created in 2014-2015 using RPG Maker VX Ace for my senior thesis project. I plan to eventually update this for RPG Maker MV and create the full game some day. It's been on hold for awhile, but I realized I have never uploaded this demo here, so enjoy!
